description:
MV "Rui Kang 56" ---------------- CallSign: 3ENJ9 Ex-Name(s) : SEAWING III Paiton II JAWA POWER TSUNEISHI NUMAKUMA 1136 Type : Handymax Sub type : Bulker Gears : 4x25T Cranes
